scripts.start: npm run clean && dotnet fable watch ./src/DevApp.fsproj -s -o ./build --noCache --run vite
scripts.build: npm run clean && dotnet fable ./src/DevApp.fsproj -o ./build --noCache --run vite build
scripts.test-headless: npm run build-test && vite build -c vite.headless.config.js && dotnet run --project ./headlessTests/HeadlessTests.fsproj
